# Intro

#### Libs

```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(lubridate)
```

#### Data

```{r}
dust<-read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "tx_master.csv")) 
```

# Clean

#### Select Columns

```{r}
dust<-
  dust %>%
  select(Dust, date, SUM)
```

Plot

```{r}
dust %>%
  filter(date %in% as.Date('2022-02-01') : as.Date('2022-12-15'))%>%
  ggplot() + geom_line(
    aes(x = date,
        y = SUM)) +
  theme_bw()+
  labs(
    x = "Month",
    y = "Dust (AOD) Summed by Day")+
 # geom_vline(xintercept = as.Date("2022-07-07"), color = "4c848c", size = 1)+
```
